attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: i downloaded it 😬and the first thing i saw👀 was a cheeto staring 👁👄👁right back at me👺🙀 i was so scared that i dropped😯 my phone 📱!!! down the balcony🙀🙀 then i started crying 😢 because my phone was broken 😤but then👺harry styles🤯 came up to me and said ello luv👋 don’t cry😢 and i said harry!!! what 🤷‍♀️are you doing here?!? and he said💁‍♀️ i’m here to save you😊 and i said save me👩 from what, harry??? and he said🗣 ~the aliens 👽 ~ and i gasped and said aliens?!? 👄 but just then🙀 an alien 👽 spaceship 🚀 landed on my balcony 👾 and then🎒 an alien stepped out 🦟🦗🦟🦗 and grabbed harry🙊 i said😱 harry!!! noooooooo!!! but 🤬 it was too late😥 harry was gone😭 giving this app a 1️⃣ star ⭐️ review because 😡 it broke my phone 📱 and got harry styles 🧑‍🦱 abducted by 👽 aliens smh😔

attributes.title: Virtual Murderer
attributes.review: I got this app at 3:08pm  Thursday 9th July to see how America was doing and what the White supremacists were hyping an orange for. I opened the app and went on it as a happy healthy girl but little did I know my happiness and innocence was going to be destroyed and crushed right there at that moment as my vision was clouded with what I assume to be a squished orange that had been left out in the sun for weeks. It had permanently damaged me physically and emotionally. I am traumatised. I am a survivor. ✨🙏✊✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: I was looking forward to see...
attributes.review: I was looking forward to see trumps plans for this year and how good of a orange president he is but as soon as you open the app it requested you to sing up with your phone number and in order to sing up you have to accept getting calls and texts the only reason I went to the app was to not get texts from his administration very 5 minutes. Bad really bad!!!

attributes.title: Super bad and horrible😭😤😤😤🤢🤢

attributes.userName: BECAUSE IT IS WAT IT IS

attributes.title: Trash app
attributes.review: App took longer to download than the new fortnite season, and when the app FINALLY downloaded it applied multiple viruses including corona. I do not recommend the app whatsoever and if you do download them be ready for the absurd amount of propaganda popping up on your phone on the daily. In the tragic event you do download the app and keep it feel free to leave the most honest and harsh review that you can think of😋🤩🥰🤫🧚‍♂️✨🌺

As soon as I opened the app AFTER it took days to download it told me to put in so much information of myself. What are they trying to track? The overall layout of the app made me not want it and deleted right away. I COULDN’T DELETE IT! What’s this all about? I was so ready to vote for Trump again, but after this using this AWFUL app I decided to vote for Biden. I’m sorry but it’s the way it goes when you have such a TERRIBLE app.

attributes.title: Horrible and disgusting 🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download and just seeing his face as the first thing on there is horrible. Why are you asking for my phone number, I know your a disgusting child predator. This app is full of racism and deleted it right away, why would you even put pictures of naked woman on there?! I’m not surprised you did any of this, but also worry about your country and not an app 🥴

attributes.title: This app ruined my life
attributes.review: It all started when I downloaded this app when I downloaded this app my car crashed and I did pay $20,000 to get it repaired then after that my mom went into a coma for what reason no reason after that my grandmother died fromRadiation through the phone because she kept on looking at this app this app is ruined my life it burn down my house and kill my child and poisoned my tea ✨💫❤️🤩🖕🏽🤮🍓🌸🤪

attributes.title: I’m uncomfortable
attributes.review: This app is absolutely uncomfortable and not worth your time. As a person of colour living in America and being a woman I don’t know how to support this. Guys he raped women and is killing most of America I refuse to be able to let a man with no self respect or regular respect. I’m swept off of my feet with rage he has continued to be sensitive with his feelings a real old sexist rapist wouldn’t let his feelings get hurt so removing the app won’t be much of an issue right☺️

attributes.title: hostage
attributes.review: HORRIBLE; I got this app and shortly after the Cheeto sent two federal agents to my house who snuck in through the window and knocked me out with a baseball bat and dragged me to an unfamiliar building where they played girl in red so loud my ears literally fell off my head, then they proceeded to tie me up and scream at me that if I didn’t vote for trump they would hold me hostage in the bunker under the White House for the rest of my life. So long story short I was EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED with this app🌈✨⚡️💦⛄️
